row.entry: This module boost highlights and softly blooms them over the image hence the name of the effect, there are numeros ways to use this module dependent on the image actual scenary lightning.

sect4.title: Usage
sect4.para: Keep the default values, and start off by changing the strength value for a pleasent value for your image, then change the size to control the spread of light.

sect5.title: size
sect5.para: Represents the spatial extent of the bloom effect.

sect5.title: threshold
sect5.para: Set the threshold turning on the increase in brightness.

sect5.title: strength
sect5.para: Set the strength of overlightning for the effect.

entry.para: This is the original image, use it as reference for the changes below...
Here I have choosen to use the size 10% which is a rather small radius for the soft light spread, and I also boosted up the strength to 50% for a more exaggerated effect.
